name: LOESS
description: Locally Weighted Scatterplot Smoothing:  Calculates a smooth line through a timeplot or scatter plot to help you to see relationship between variables and foresee trends. Used in regression analysis.

properties.name: n_preds
properties.description: Number of points to generate predictions for (length or a regular sequence along x's range).

properties.name: span
properties.description: Span parameter for loess smoothing (higher = smoother).
